title: Vervaeke and Peterson on Christianity, Agency, Love, Transformations and Language
description:
What kind of transformation is Christian conversion psychologically? Jordan Peterson and John Vervaeke are wrestling with these issues. Vervaeke in his Meaning Crisis series is now dealing with Christianity. Many have asked me for commentary on it. This is the beginning of that.
